generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance, with a Mercedes-Benz emblem visible on the hood indicating the perspective from a vehicle.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a large building with steps and statues.
- building: A large, ornate stone building with classical architectural features, including columns, statues, and detailed stonework, is prominently featured on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Several trees with green foliage are visible in the background and along the left side of the road, as well as some grassy areas.
- terrain: There are patches of grass and dirt along the left side of the road, forming a small grassy area next to the sidewalk and curb.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and the building, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Two people are visible sitting on the steps of the building on the right side of the image.
- pole: A tall, thin pole with a flag attached is visible on the left side of the image, near the road.
- fence: A low fence or barrier with posts is visible in the background, running along the left side of the road.
- car: A car is visible parked in the background on the left side of the road, behind the fence.
